Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near 47th Street/Western
ShortDescription: 94 California buses rerouted NB: Orange Line, Western, 51st, California & 47th; SB: California, 51st, Western & Orange Line near 47th Street/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 47th Street/Western.

Northbound buses will operate via Orange Line, Western, 51st, California, and 47th.

Southbound buses will operate via California, 51st, Western, and Orange Line.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Irving Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
